review: Holy cow this place is always packed!  Food here has been either awesome or cold.  I've had more awesome plates of food than cold lately, so it might've just been going through "new restaurant" syndrome or something.  Alcoholic beverages are tasty and the strawberry lemonade is killer.  Even though it seems to always be packed, they are quick about getting you a table or offering to seat you at the bar.
This is the worst Applebee's I've ever been to!  Horrible service, food is mediocre. Seriously, if you want a good burger, go to Red Robin!
